query:
-- RCRA Facility Status Table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `rcraFacilityStatus` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `inspectionId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `epaId` varchar(32),
  `facilityName` text,
  `interimStatus` enum('active','transitioning','permitted','closed') DEFAULT 'active',
  `tankSystemType` enum('existing','new') DEFAULT 'existing',
  `tankMaterial` enum('metal','polyethylene','fiberglass','concrete','other') DEFAULT 'metal',
  `tankCapacityGallons` decimal(12,2),
  `wasteTypes` text,
  `peCertificationDate` timestamp,
  `peCertificationExpiry` timestamp,
  `peEngineerName` text,
  `peEngineerLicense` varchar(64),
  `secondaryContainmentStatus` enum('compliant','exempt_daily_inspection','upgrade_required','non_compliant') DEFAULT 'compliant',
  `airEmissionControlLevel` enum('level_1','level_2','exempt') DEFAULT 'level_1',
  `closureStatus` enum('operational','closure_planned','clean_closure','landfill_closure') DEFAULT 'operational',
  `lastAssessmentDate` timestamp,
  `nextAssessmentDue` timestamp,
  `notes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
);

-- RCRA Checklist Items Table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `rcraChecklistItems` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `inspectionId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `category` enum('integrity_assessment','daily_visual','corrosion_protection','secondary_containment','ancillary_equipment','air_emission_controls','leak_detection','spill_overfill_prevention') NOT NULL,
  `itemCode` varchar(16) NOT NULL,
  `itemDescription` text NOT NULL,
  `regulatoryReference` varchar(64),
  `status` enum('satisfactory','unsatisfactory','na','not_inspected') DEFAULT 'not_inspected',
  `findings` text,
  `correctiveActionRequired` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `correctiveActionDescription` text,
  `correctiveActionDueDate` timestamp,
  `correctiveActionCompletedDate` timestamp,
  `inspectorName` text,
  `inspectionDate` timestamp,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
);

-- RCRA Secondary Containment Table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `rcraSecondaryContainment` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `inspectionId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `containmentType` enum('concrete','steel','hdpe_liner','double_wall','vault','other') DEFAULT 'concrete',
  `linerType` enum('hdpe','xlpe','epoxy_coating','pvdf','xr5','none') DEFAULT 'none',
  `linerThicknessMils` int,
  `capacityGallons` decimal(12,2),
  `largestTankGallons` decimal(12,2),
  `stormWaterCapacityGallons` decimal(12,2),
  `floorSlopePercent` decimal(5,2),
  `sumpPresent` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `leakDetectionType` enum('visual','electronic','manual','none') DEFAULT 'visual',
  `lastInspectionDate` timestamp,
  `condition` enum('good','fair','poor','failed') DEFAULT 'good',
  `notes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
);

-- RCRA Corrosion Protection Table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `rcraCorrosionProtection` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `inspectionId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `protectionType` enum('sacrificial_anode','impressed_current','coating_only','frp_construction','stainless_steel','none') DEFAULT 'none',
  `cathodicProtectionPresent` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `lastCpTestDate` timestamp,
  `cpTestResult` enum('adequate','inadequate','not_tested') DEFAULT 'not_tested',
  `pipeToSoilPotential` decimal(6,3),
  `anodeCondition` enum('good','fair','poor','depleted') DEFAULT 'good',
  `rectifierReading` decimal(8,2),
  `coatingType` text,
  `coatingCondition` enum('good','fair','poor','failed') DEFAULT 'good',
  `lastCoatingInspection` timestamp,
  `notes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
);

-- RCRA Ancillary Equipment Table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `rcraAncillaryEquipment` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `inspectionId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `equipmentType` enum('piping','valve','pump','flange','fitting','other') NOT NULL,
  `equipmentId` varchar(64),
  `description` text,
  `material` text,
  `connectionType` enum('welded','threaded','flanged','other') DEFAULT 'flanged',
  `aboveground` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `secondaryContainmentExempt` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `exemptionReason` enum('aboveground_piping_daily_inspection','welded_connections','sealless_equipment','automatic_shutoff','none') DEFAULT 'none',
  `lastInspectionDate` timestamp,
  `condition` enum('good','fair','poor','failed') DEFAULT 'good',
  `leakDetected` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `notes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
);

-- RCRA Inspection Schedule Table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `rcraInspectionSchedule` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `inspectionId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `scheduleType` enum('daily_visual','bimonthly_impressed_current','annual_cathodic_protection','annual_leak_test','pe_integrity_assessment') NOT NULL,
  `frequencyDays` int NOT NULL,
  `lastCompletedDate` timestamp,
  `nextDueDate` timestamp,
  `assignedTo` text,
  `reminderSent` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `notes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
);
